parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if a soldier's hands are hit, which results in inaccurate aiming.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''handsHit''' unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] -  
If the hands are not damaged, the returned value is 0. If the hands are hit or the unit is dead, the returned value is 1.
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>? (handsHit [[player]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 1) : [[player]] [[globalChat]] "Ouch! Don't shoot at my hands dammit!"</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[damage]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
